text: Nimisha Singh (born 17 August 1998) is an Indian fashion designer and entrepreneur. She is the founder and CEO of the fashion brand Label Nimisha. In 2024, she became the first Indian designer to walk the red carpet at the Cannes Film Festival. == Career == Nimisha Singh started her fashion career at the age of 18 with the launch of her brand, Label Nimisha. She is also associated with the costume departments of Excel Entertainment and Red Chillies Entertainment as a costume director. In 2024, Nimisha made history as the first Indian designer to walk the Cannes Film Festival red carpet on 19 May. == References == Category:Fashion designers Category:Indian people Category:1998 births Category:Living people
title: Nimisha Singh
